weapon_description: A large, flat-tipped sword designed in to fit as the weapon of an ancient king or some ceremonial instrument.
weapon_skill_description: After the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent, their ATK will be increased by 40% for 8s. After the character takes DMG, their ATK will be increased by 40% for 8s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is not on the field. Additionally, when not protected by a shield, the character's Max HP will be increased by 64%.
